Honest Jon was a member of the Targos Guard, active in the early 14 century DR.
Honest Jon was dressed in the Targos Guards leather armor, a horned helmet, and was armed with a spear and dagger.
In the , the town of Targos in Icewind Dale was besieged by the Legion of the Chimera. One of the Legions surprise attacks hit the Targos docks, where Jon, Brohn, and Reig Redwaters stood guard. Jon survived unscathed, but Brohn was killed and Reig was badly wounded. Jon did his best to bandage his partners wound, but he needed a healing potion or risk bleeding to death. Shortly after, the Wicked Wench arrived with a group of adventuring mercenaries from Luskan, who proceeded to aid Reig and the town at large.
